mapper.sql: commentId, commentUserId, replyUserId, contentId, siteId, createTime, replyTime, ups, downs, isRecommend, isChecked, score, parentId, replyCount
mapper.select:
SELECT a.commentId commentId, b.text TEXT, b.reply reply, c.title title, b.ip ip, a.createTime createTime, a.commentUserId commentUserId FROM cms_comment a,cms_comment_ext b,cms_content_ext c WHERE a.commentId = b.commentId AND a.contentId = c.contentId
AND c.contentId like CONCAT('%',#{contentId},'%')
AND a.isChecked like CONCAT('%',#{isChecked},'%')
AND a.isRecommend = #{isRecommend}
ORDER BY a.createTime DESC

SELECT a.commentId commentId, b.text TEXT, b.reply reply, b.ip ip, a.createTime createTime, a.commentUserId commentUserId FROM cms_comment a,cms_comment_ext b WHERE a.commentId = b.commentId AND a.contentId = #{contentId}
